TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ConfigurationConverterBase extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter
Public MustInherit Class ConfigurationConverterBase Inherits TypeConverter
public ref class ConfigurationConverterBase abstract : System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter

summary.span: 組態轉換子型別的基底類別。

span.span: The base class for the configuration converter types.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 是組態類型的轉換子的基底類別。The is the base class for the converter configuration types. 這些是將字串轉換的型別，但找到組態檔中，與相關的強型別屬性。These are types that convert strings, found in the configuration file, to and from the related strongly typed properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生自類別來建立自訂子型別。The following code examples show how to derive from the class to create a custom converter type. 此外，範例會示範如何在自訂的區段中使用此類型。Also, the examples show how to use this type in a custom section. 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂子型別，從類別。The following code example shows how to create a custom converter type from the class. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter/CS/TimeSpanMinutesConverter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter/VB/TimeSpanMinutesConverter.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義使用先前自訂的自訂區段轉換器。The following code example shows how to define a custom section that uses the previous custom converter. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationConvertersCustomSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationConvertersCustomSection/CS/ConfigurationConvertersCustomSection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationConvertersCustomSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationConvertersCustomSection/VB/ConfigurationConvertersCustomSection.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和修改組態檔，使用先前的自訂區段。The following code example shows how to create and modify a configuration file using the previous custom section. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase/CS/ConfigurationConverterBase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase/VB/ConfigurationConverterBase.vb#1)] 以下是為前一個範例所使用的組態摘錄。The following is a configuration excerpt as used by the previous example. ```xml
```

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為您通常會使用系統提供的轉換器類型，唯一的時候您需要建構函式是當您必須建立您自己的轉換類型。Because you normally use the converter types provided by the system, the only time you need the constructor is when you must create your own conversion type.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool CanConvertFrom (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext ctx, Type type);

Determines whether the conversion is allowed.

span.span: if the conversion is allowed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會判斷是否可以強型別屬性，以取得組態檔中使用的值字串上執行的轉換。The method determines whether a conversion can be performed on strongly typed properties to obtain value strings used in the configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法用來建立自訂子型別。The following example code shows how to override the method to create a custom converter type. 此外，範例會示範如何在自訂的區段中使用此類型。Also, the example shows how to use this type in a custom section. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter/CS/TimeSpanMinutesConverter.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter/VB/TimeSpanMinutesConverter.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會判斷組態檔中所含的字串是否可轉換成相關的強型別屬性。The method determines whether the strings contained in the configuration file can be converted to the related strongly typed properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法用來建立自訂子型別。The following example code shows how to override the method to create a custom converter type. 此外，範例會示範如何在自訂的區段中使用此類型。Also, the example shows how to use this type in a custom section. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter/CS/TimeSpanMinutesConverter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter/VB/TimeSpanMinutesConverter.vb#2)]
